Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1987...
Earned first career win on 6/6/1989...
Had first career hit on 6/26/1989, off Franky Mosqueda (SHP)...
Traded from New Jersey to Gashouse on 3/1/1990 (Going to GHG: P A. Diez, P G. Ubeda, P J. Young. Going to NJ: CF M. McPhee)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1991, going 3-1, 1.40...
Injured on 4/11/1992 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
